## Testing

### Manual Testing

- [ ] Tested locally with development server
- [ ] Tested with different image formats (JPEG, PNG, WebP)
- [ ] Tested with various image sizes
- [ ] Tested in multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)

### Automated Testing

- [ ] Added unit tests
- [ ] Added integration tests
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] Code coverage maintained/improved

### WebAssembly Testing

- [ ] WebAssembly module builds successfully
- [ ] WASM functionality works in browsers
- [ ] Web Worker processes correctly
- [ ] Memory usage is within acceptable limits

## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Linting passes (`pnpm run lint`)
- [ ] Code is properly formatted (`pnpm run format`)
- [ ] TypeScript types are correct
- [ ] No console errors or warnings

### Documentation

- [ ] README.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Comments added for complex code
- [ ] Inline documentation is clear

### Performance

- [ ] No performance regressions
- [ ] WebAssembly performance maintained
- [ ] Memory usage is optimized
- [ ] Bundle size impact considered

### Security

- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] WebAssembly security considered
- [ ] Dependencies are up-to-date
